name: Overdosed (LogicProjects)
description:
Control with WASD and use Space to Jump/Exit dialog.  Comment with your best time (I have a 1:41)!  

Source under MIT/Apache: https://github.com/mwbryant/logic_overdosed/

All Art and Audio created during the jam by LogicProjects.  All core gameplay code written during the jam but some simple things like the fade effect were taken/modified from older projects.  Font is public domain.
